dcterms:creator: Y.-G. Jiang
J. Liu
A. Roshan Zamir
G. Toderici
I. Laptev
M. Shah
R. Sukthankar
dcterms:description: The THUMOS’14 dataset is designed for action recognition and detection, consisting of a large number of classes and untrimmed videos. It includes 20 action classes from a total of 101, focusing on sports actions.
dcterms:title: THUMOS’14

dcterms:creator: F. Caba Heilbron
V. Escorcia
B. Ghanem
J. Carlos Niebles
dcterms:description: ActivityNet is a large-scale video benchmark for human activity understanding, consisting of untrimmed videos with temporal annotations for various activities.
dcterms:title: ActivityNet
